text: Patrick Laffan (8 June 1939 – 14 March 2019) was an Irish actor. Laffan is best remembered for playing the lothario milkman Pat Mustard in the Channel Four sitcom Father Ted episode 'Speed 3' (1998), and Mr Burgess in Roddy Doyle's The Snapper (1993). ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
